data.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - Kansas City Southern - EMD SD70MAC - Grey
data.detailed_description: The Electro-Motive Divsion SC70MAC was built in response to the GE Dah-9 44-CW. Over 5,700 units have been produced; most of these are the SD70M and SD70MAC models.
data.about_the_game: The Electro-Motive Divsion SC70MAC was built in response to the GE Dah-9 44-CW. Over 5,700 units have been produced; most of these are the SD70M and SD70MAC models.
data.short_description: The Electro-Motive Divsion SC70MAC was built in response to the GE Dah-9 44-CW. Over 5,700 units have been produced; most of these are the SD70M and SD70MAC models.
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian, French, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

data.legal_notice: Published and developed by N3V Games Pty Ltd . N3V Games, Trainz and their respective logos are trademarks of N3V Games.  All other trademarks, logos and copyrights are property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.
